page.title: 12WHAT CHILDREN LIKE DOING
page.content: by{Graeme}and{Scott}and{Laura I like{playing}in the{ruins}and playing hide and seek in the{hay, and{milking the cows,}but you have to {watch}because they might{kick}you. I go down to the{castle}with my {friends,}and it is good fun seeing what I can{find}on the{shore. I like{climbing trees}and making {tree houses. In winter time we have to{clean out the{byre}after the cows and calves, and later in the year we have to{lift the sleepers}and put all the {muck}into the{spreader}and spread it onto the field. It is{good fun {wheeling the wheelbarrow. I like{painting,}playing on the {swing}and{riding my bike. I like{making camps in the hay and{playing}on my{bogey.}I like making {bonfires}and{cooking sausages.
